entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Edson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -28.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edson Airport 06:49 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -28.6°C
Pressure: 103.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -31.3°C
Wind: E 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm near the Swan Hills. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17 except minus 10 over southern sections. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 60 percent chance of flurries later in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17 except minus 10 over southern sections. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
